skill.name: project-planning
skill.description: Generate initial project planning documents (PVS, ADR, Tech Spec, Roadmap) from a project concept description. Use when starting a new project, when docs/planning/ contains placeholder files, or when user requests project planning document generation.
skill.summary: Generate initial project planning documents (PVS, ADR, Tech Spec, Roadmap) from a project concept de...
skill.author: ByronWilliamsCPA

security_audit.summary: This is a pure documentation skill with no executable code that poses security risks. The only script is a markdown validator that reads files from docs/planning/ and outputs validation results. No network calls, no file writes, no command execution.

content.value_statement: Starting a new project without clear planning leads to architectural drift and context loss. This skill generates four essential documents (PVS, ADR, Tech Spec, Roadmap) that guide AI-assisted development and maintain coherence across coding sessions.
actual_capabilities: Generate Project Vision & Scope document with problem statement and success metrics
Create Architecture Decision Records for key technical choices
Write Technical Implementation Specification with tech stack and data model
Build Development Roadmap with phased implementation plan
Validate documents for completeness and cross-references
Synthesize all documents into actionable PROJECT-PLAN.md
limitations: Requires user to provide initial project description and constraints
Does not execute code or modify project files directly
Does not integrate with external project management tools
Relies on zen-mcp-server for consensus review (optional)

use_cases.title: Start new AI-assisted projects
use_cases.description: Generate comprehensive planning documents before writing any code to ensure AI tools have clear architectural context.

use_cases.title: Document architectural decisions
use_cases.description: Create ADRs that capture key technical choices with rationale, alternatives considered, and consequences.

use_cases.title: Plan phased implementation
use_cases.description: Build detailed roadmaps with user stories, success criteria, and clear phase dependencies.

prompt_templates.title: New project
prompt_templates.scenario: Generate planning for a new project
prompt_templates.prompt: I want to build a [project type] for [target users] that solves [problem]. Use the /plan skill to generate project planning documents with the following constraints: [list constraints].

prompt_templates.title: Document review
prompt_templates.prompt: Review the planning documents in docs/planning/ against the current codebase. Check for consistency between what was planned and what was implemented. Flag any discrepancies.

prompt_templates.title: Update roadmap
prompt_templates.prompt: I completed [task] from Phase [N]. Update docs/planning/roadmap.md to mark tasks as complete, update milestone progress, and add the next tasks to the TODO list.

prompt_templates.title: ADR creation
prompt_templates.prompt: I need to make a technical decision about [component/feature]. Create an ADR in docs/planning/adr/adr-[NNN]-[topic].md that documents the context, options considered, decision made, and consequences.

output_examples.input: Generate planning documents for a personal fragrance rating app
output: âœ“ project-vision.md - Problem statement and scope

best_practices: Generate planning documents before writing any code to establish architectural context for AI assistants
Review and validate each document using the consensus tool before proceeding to the next
Update documents as the project evolves to prevent drift between planned and actual implementation
anti_patterns: Skipping planning and asking AI to generate code without architectural context
Using generated documents without reviewing them for project-specific accuracy
Failing to update documents when implementation differs from the original plan

faq.question: Does this skill modify my project files?
faq.answer: No. This skill generates planning documents in docs/planning/ but requires user confirmation before writing files.

faq.question: Can I use this with existing projects?
faq.answer: Yes. Provide your project description and the skill will generate appropriate documents based on your context.

faq.question: What tools does this skill require?
faq.answer: The skill works standalone. Optionally uses mcp__zen__consensus for expert review of generated documents.

faq.question: How many documents are generated?
faq.answer: Four documents: Project Vision & Scope, Technical Spec, Roadmap, and at least one ADR.

faq.question: Is my project data safe?
faq.answer: Yes. All processing happens locally. Documents are generated from your input without external data transmission.

faq.question: How is this different from other planning tools?
faq.answer: This skill specifically targets AI-assisted development with templates designed to provide context coherence across Claude Code sessions.
